public class Player extends util.Observable implements Serializable
Class that represents the Player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player()
    Constructor of the Class.
    This sets the two flags scoringToken to false, initializes the score to 0 and sets the flag isFirstPlayer to false.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()

      Constructor of the Class.
      This sets the two flags scoringToken to false, initializes the score to 0 and sets the flag isFirstPlayer to false.

  • Method Details

    • setAsFirstPlayer

      public void setAsFirstPlayer()

      Method that sets a Player as first player. This also notifies the Observers with a Message.

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(@NotNull @NotNull String nickname)

      Method that given a String parameter sets is as the player nickname, after checking that the parameter is not null. This also notifies the Observers with a Message

      Parameters:
      nickname - a String
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if nickname is empty

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()

      Method that returns the nickname of the Player.

      Returns:
      a String that represents the nickname

    • setMyBookshelf

      public void setMyBookshelf(Bookshelf bookshelf)

    • getMyBookshelf

      public Bookshelf getMyBookshelf()

      Method that returns the player's bookshelf.

      Returns:
      a Bookshelf, belonging to the player

    • getScore

      public int getScore()

      Method that returns the player's score.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the player's score

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(int score)

      Method that given an int, updates the player's score. This also notifies the Observers with a Message.

      Parameters:
      score - an int that represents one of the three possible partial scores

    • setPersonalGoalCard

      public void setPersonalGoalCard(PersonalGoalCard pgc)

      Method that sets the given PersonalGoalCard parameter as the player's personal goal card. This also notifies the Observers with a Message

      Parameters:
      pgc - a PersonalGoalCard

    • getPersonalGoalCard

      public PersonalGoalCard getPersonalGoalCard()

      Method that returns the player's personal goal card.

      Returns:
      PersonalGoalCard

    • getScoringToken1

      public boolean getScoringToken1()

      Method that returns the status of the first scoring token.

      Returns:
      true if the player has already picked the scoring token of the first common goal card, false otherwise

    • setScoringToken1

      public void setScoringToken1()

      Method that sets to true the flag scoringToken1. This also notifies the Observers with a Message.
      NOTE: Once the player completes a CommonGoalCard, they won't be able to collect other points from that CGC, this method is invoked when a players completes a common goal .

    • getScoringToken2

      public boolean getScoringToken2()

      Method that returns the status of the second scoring token.

      Returns:
      true if the player has already picked the scoring token of the second common goal card, false otherwise

    • setScoringToken2

      public void setScoringToken2()

      Method that sets to true the flag scoringToken2. This also notifies the Observers with a Message.
      NOTE: Once the player completes a CommonGoalCard, they won't be able to collect other points from that CGC, this method is invoked when a players completes a common goal .

    • checkCompletePGC

      public int checkCompletePGC()

      Method that returns the reached score of the personal goal card. Based on how many tiles are rightly placed, an int that represents the personal goal card score, gets returned.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the "delta" of the score that has to be added to the general score
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when a number of tiles completed is different from an int in between 0 and 6

    • checkAdjacentBookshelf

      public int checkAdjacentBookshelf()

      Method that returns a partial score regarding the adjacencies of tiles of the same tipe in the player's bookshelf.

      Returns:
      an int that represents the adjacencies score that has to be added to the general score

    • checkBookshelf

      public boolean checkBookshelf()

      Method that returns the status of a bookshelf.

      Returns:
      true if a bookshelf has one or more tiles of a regular type, false otherwise.
